# reorderingHandlers

**Instance Property**

The diffable data source’s handlers for reordering items.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var reorderingHandlers: __UICollectionViewDiffableDataSourceReorderingHandlers { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide reordering handlers to support the reordering of items in your collection view.

The system calls the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewDiffableDataSourceReorderingHandlers/didReorderHandler] handler after a reordering transaction ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSDiffableDataSourceTransaction-swift.struct]) occurs, so you can update your data backing store with information about the changes.
